subject.physique: Slim, fit, hourglass figure, fair skined tone

hair.accessory: Large light blue fabric bow tied at the top of the head

face.expression: Neutral to soft confidence, looking slightly off-camera
face.makeup: Soft glam, defined eyebrows, contoured cheeks, nude-pink matte lipstick, black eyeliner

details: Structured bodice with visible boning channels
Sweetheart neckline with delicate white lace trim
Flared A-line skater skirt with pleats

Black and white checkered marble flooring
